items.title: Bill Belichick's legacy takes a detour at North Carolina
items.description: A season in, the legendary NFL coach's head-scratching decision to helm a lowly ACC team continues to confound.

items.title: Despite some lackluster offenses on Monday night, some 49ers and Panthers stood out
items.description: Eric Moody finds some silver linings in the inefficient play of QBs Brock Purdy and Bryce Young on Monday night.

items.title: Free agent pickups: The players you need for a playoff push
items.description: All the free agent options worth adding as we look ahead to Week 13.

items.title: CFP Bubble Watch: Who's in, who's out, who has work to do in each league
items.description: Trying to make sense of the constantly evolving playoff picture, conference by conference.

items.title: Projecting the College Football Playoff top 12 after Week 13
items.description: We assess how the committee could stack the top teams in the country.
